entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is introduced as the one who backed into the room carrying a pile of freshly laundered robes.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as the one who said the booklists had come at last.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is introduced as the one whose pajamas are too short and needs new ones.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who blushed harder than ever.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is introduced as the one who suggested getting Ron red and gold pajamas to match his badge.

relationships.description: Mrs. Weasley is taking care of Ron's needs, getting him new pajamas.
George is suggesting what color pajamas Ron should get.
Ginny told Mrs. Weasley that the booklists had come at last.
Hermione is talking to Ron about his needs.
